definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Milne resigned in sympathy because of the way Donald had been treated.
sentences.chinese: 米爾恩以辭職來抗議唐納德所遭受的不公待遇。

sentences.english: The place was in charge of a Major Donald, a good-nature fellow.
sentences.chinese: 這地方由性情和善的唐納德市長負責。

sentences.english: Donald has chance umbrageous at his friends for creature so unkind.
sentences.chinese: 唐納德因爲他的朋友太不客氣，所以被激怒了。

sentences.english: But they held their ground, and took Donald home with them.
sentences.chinese: 但是，父母有他們的立場，他們把唐納德帶回了家。

sentences.english: I also want to thank Donald for his excellent chairmanship.
sentences.chinese: 我也要感謝唐納德精彩的主持。

sentences.english: Donald will remain in college until(till) he finishes his Ph.D course.
sentences.chinese: 唐納德將留在學校直到完成他的博士學位課程。

sentences.english: From the blind, I see Donald on his singing perch.
sentences.chinese: 透過百葉窗，我看到唐納德在枝頭引吭高歌。

sentences.english: Donald’s parents came for him in August of 1938.
sentences.chinese: 1938年8月唐納德的父母帶他回到家中。

sentences.english: I cross my fingers for Donald and slip inside.
sentences.chinese: 我划着十字，默默爲唐納德祈禱，悄悄溜進窗簾後面。

sentences.english: Donald and the female begin a game of hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 唐納德與雌鳥開始玩起捉迷藏的遊戲。

sentences.english: His remarks on Donald’s full year under his care covered less than half a page.
sentences.chinese: 他對唐納德照顧了一年，寫出的評語還不到半頁。

sentences.english: The only thing inconvenienced would be Donald's bottom line.
sentences.chinese: 唯一不便之處是唐納德的進賬會受到影響。

sentences.english: Donald Trump and I use debt to get richer.
sentences.chinese: 唐納德特朗普和我因爲債務變富。

sentences.english: Odd old Donald caught a cold and ordered a sock.
sentences.chinese: 古怪的老唐納德感冒後訂購了襪子。

definition: Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
(Tw) Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, president 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state
